title: Horror Ambient & Music Pack
description: This pack contains a large library of high quality horror ambient sound tracks and cinematic music tracks.
longDescription:
MUSIC TRACKS SAMPLE: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=dBT95RitTM0

AMBIENT TRACKS SAMPLE: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=OBn6mWblVQs&t=683s

Ambient sound tracks breathes life into your scene, they play a very important role in immersing a player into your project. This pack contains 40 high quality horror ambient sound tracks that will efficiently creep you out. Also included is 29 high quality cinematic music tracks of various styles and vibes ranging from a slow and dark feel all the way to hard hitting and aggressive orchestra music tracks. You will get a total of 69 sound tracks. All tracks can be looped seamlessly.
technicalDetails:
Features: (Please include a full, comprehensive list of the features of the product)

  •  40 HIGH QUALITY AMBIENT SOUND TRACKS
  • 29 HIGH QUALITY MUSIC TRACKS
  •  SEAMLESSLY LOOPED SOUND TRACKS

Number of Audio Wavs:69

Number of Audio Cues:69

Sample rate / bit rate: 22,050 -44,100 Hz

Does music loop: YES

Minutes of audio provided: 75

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: YES

Mac: N/A
